articles.title: 'My heart is heavy': Star Trek alumni and others react to death of Nichelle Nichols, who played Lt Uhura - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: "My heart is heavy, my eyes shining like the stars you now rest among, my dearest friend," tweeted George Takei, who played Sulu alongside Nichols in Star Trek.
articles.content: I shall have more to say about the trailblazing, incomparable Nichelle Nichols, who shared the bridge with us as Lt Uhura of the USS Enterprise, and who passed today at age 89. For today, my heart is… [+1938 chars]

articles.title: Asia’s richest men prep for battle as Adani enters Ambani’s turf - Hindustan Times
articles.description: After peacefully expanding in their respective domains for over two decades, Asia’s two richest men are increasingly treading the same ground, as Adani in particular sets his sights beyond his traditional areas of focus.

articles.title: From Golden Mile to The Cathay: The Projector's long and 'organic' journey as Singapore's only indie cinema - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: What drives The Projector forward, and do the people behind it have a dream space they'd like to occupy next? Co-founder Karen Tan sat with CNA Lifestyle to tell us more (Hint: Think about old airports).

articles.title: Commentary: Singapore Changi Airport recovery leading in Asia but lags global standards - CNA
articles.description: Changi Airport is recouping its pre-pandemic passenger traffic faster than expected but is still behind peers in other regions. Full recovery could take a few years, says aviation analyst Brendan Sobie.
articles.content:
Foreign airlines are now gradually increasing their capacity at Changi and should eventually close the gap with SIA.
Overall capacity will also at some point catch up with demand, leading to more no… [+1713 chars]

articles.description: There is "a really quite important cultural difference" in Asia that epidemiologists suggest is having a dramatic impact on their daily rate of COVID-19 deaths.
